qas.question: The Fashion Institute of Technology is on the corner of 27th Street and what Avenue?
What year was the New York Life Building built?
Who designed the New York Life Building?
Which hospital is located at the end if 27th Street?
Which park does 27th Street pass through between Ninth and Tenth Avenues?

context: Heading east, 27th Street passes through <a4_0>Chelsea<a4_0/> Park between Tenth and Ninth Avenues, with the Fashion Institute of Technology (FIT) on the corner of <a0_0>Eighth<a0_0/>. On Madison Avenue between 26th and 27th streets, on the site of the old Madison Square Garden, is the New York Life Building, built in <a1_0>1928<a1_0/> and designed by <a2_0>Cass Gilbert<a2_0/>, with a square tower topped by a striking gilded pyramid. Twenty-Seventh Street passes one block north of Madison Square Park and culminates at <a3_0>Bellevue<a3_0/> Hospital Center on First Avenue.
